title: macson
author: macson
created_time: December 30, 2022, 10:38:34 AMLast edit: June 13, 2023, 07:08:45 PM by macson
content: a glimpse of Fifa Int. Team & Int. Club & Friendly matchesQuoteFriendly matches are just matches between two national teams or club teams that are built on the sole idea of improving. Friendly matches don't count for anything and are just matches to see how the players are doing. However, a friendly doesn't mean you're going to go easy. A friendly or exhibition game in soccer is a non-competitive game played outside of any recognized soccer competition. The result of this stand-alone game has no effect on the standings of the teams in either a league or tournament. Because they are not competitive, they are known as friendly games.Previously, i saw that the discussion about this competition had already been discussed in this topic, but it was locked [Gambling on friendly matches]gambling sites that provide places to bet Int. Team & Int. comments.author: Tumanggor
comments.body: I was watching a friendly match between Juventus vs standard and juventus is the host, btw it was really Danilo's fault for committing an own goal so standard got 1 goalJuventus made a lot of substitutions, and Matias Soule, who entered in the 46th minute, managed to score 1 goal for Juventus through a penalty goalit looks like this match will end in a draw, I didn't expect the standard to have 59% ball possession lol

comments.author: Tumanggor
comments.body: the friendly match that will occur later between Dortmund vs Fortuna dusseldorf today reportedly will  give a surprise to the dortmund fans, sebastian haller and mateu morey will appear there, then the chances of winning Dortmund are very bigI see this friendly match will be very good for haller because he has been on not play for a long time due to the illness he is suffering, hope nothing bad happens to haller in the friendly match later

comments.author: macson
comments.body: Quote from: Tumanggor on January 09, 2023, 10:46:47 PMthe friendly match that will occur later between Dortmund vs Fortuna dusseldorf today reportedly will  give a surprise to the dortmund fans, sebastian haller and mateu morey will appear there, then the chances of winning Dortmund are very bigI see this friendly match will be very good for haller because he has been on not play for a long time due to the illness he is suffering, hope nothing bad happens to haller in the friendly match laterthis is the emotional video i saw in the online news today, clearly visible the emotional moment of Sebastian Haller (Haller's substitution Moukoko in the 74th minute) coming back to the field after 6 months of his cancer treatment.[1] https://www.thesun.co.uk/sport/21001287/moment-sebastian-haller-dortmund-testicular-cancer/even though dortmund won 5-1 vs dusseldorf, haller didn't score a single goal in that match, a good start for him.

comments.author: macson
comments.body: QuoteEnthusiasm occurred in Beijing when welcoming the arrival of the Argentina national team. Many fans greeted Lionel Messi when he arrived at the airport on his private jet. Messi, who had just announced his move to club Inter Miami, United States, was seen arriving in Beijing, Saturday (10/6/2023), with Ángel Di María, Rodrigo De Paul, Leandro Paredes, Enzo Fernandez and Nahuel Molinathis friendly match between argentina vs australia is really interesting, and it is very likely that argentina and australia will field their core team even though this is just a friendly match, previously argentina had played against australia in round of 16 last december world cup, there argentina narrowly won 2 -1 over Australia and 1 goal made by Messi and 1 goal made by Alvarez, while the goal that Australia got was due to suicide by Fernandez, several gambling sites provide bets for this match and i choose Argentina which will win smoothly.

comments.author: Stepstowealth
comments.body: Quote from: macson on June 13, 2023, 07:16:06 PMthis friendly match between argentina vs australia is really interesting, and it is very likely that argentina and australia will field their core team even though this is just a friendly match, previously argentina had played against australia in round of 16 last december world cup, there argentina narrowly won 2 -1 over Australia and 1 goal made by Messi and 1 goal made by Alvarez, while the goal that Australia got was due to suicide by Fernandez, several gambling sites provide bets for this match and i choose Argentina which will win smoothly.The Argentina vs Australia game was very easy to predict we all knew that Argentina knowing that they are the top of world football right now will win the game. He may have just been a friendly game but for Lionel Messi, it's another game that he will remember as he set a new record for the fastest goal scored in his career in less than a three minutes of a game starting. One other good thing from the game that I am happy about is that the young Star boy from Manchester United, Alejandro Garnacho was able to represent his country Argentina after missing out on the world cup team, he has a very bright football career ahead of him still. The game ended with Argentina winning by two goals, the goal from Messi and the substitute German Pezzella.

comments.author: Slow death
comments.body: we have very interesting games today, argentina will play against indonesia, honestly the difference between these two teams is so big that i even ask myself what argentina really hopes to achieve with this game, because it doesn't make much sense to choose a very weak opponent, we will also have germany's game against colombia that i also see germany had to have chosen a strong opponent to see where they need to improve, and then there's also the brazil game against senegal, brazil made an acceptable choice although in my opinion they should also have chosen opponent strongperhaps one of the main reasons why brazil, argentina and germany did not choose strong opponents is because in europe the big teams are playing the qualifiers for the euro 2024, but even so they could have chosen other better teams, but in the end I see victory for the favorites are brazil, argentina, germany, but it is strange to see odds of @1.50 for germany in case of victory, this shows that bookmakers look at colombia as an opponent that can surprise and they are right, germany has dropped a lot in recent times years, and sad, they were a great team in the past

comments.author: swogerino
comments.body: Friendlies game are the worse of the worse to bet on,Germany losing to Poland is just an example of why the big teams do not care much and they only try different setups and way of plays so they can see how effective they are to implement them in real competitions.If you want to lose money then go ahead and bet on friendly games,it is a known fact that the casinos and sport bookies make the most of their money from friendly games,the odds are somewhat different also,the over and under goals are different also so it is difficult to win here.Some people have net huge wins in some occasions but those have been very specific cases in 99% betting on friendlies is a waste of time.

comments.author: Queentoshi
comments.body: Quote from: swogerino on June 18, 2023, 07:44:00 PMFriendlies game are the worse of the worse to bet on,Germany losing to Poland is just an example of why the big teams do not care much and they only try different setups and way of plays so they can see how effective they are to implement them in real competitions.If you want to lose money then go ahead and bet on friendly gamesGermany continue to loose friendly games, more pressure will be on the coach as the lost to Columbia by two goals. Even though not winning in these games will not cost the team anything, but if the team has lost series of consecutive friendly games like Germany has done against teams that you would expect them to win over, it is a strong sign that something is wrong, something to be concerned about. Columbia had not played a European country for a long time before this game, but they still played boldly and scored two goals. Germany needs to improve.

comments.author: macson
comments.body: Al Nassr will face Benfica, in this match many doubted that Al Nassr would win after they lost 5-0 to Celta Vigo.  football observers continue to criticize the performance of al nassr's front line if cristiano is not played, well al nassr is very dependent on cristiano ronaldo.  i see benfica has good strength to beat al nassr, the probability is big enough for them to win, i will choose benfica in my bet.after facing benfica.. al nassr's next opponents are PSG and Inter, these two teams are very good for al nassr, moreover they need more experience against big European teams.
